Uses of Class
music.Chord

  • Packages that use Chord 
    Package Description
    music
    Contains all of the datatypes responsible for containing musical elements.
    tests
    Package containing all of our test files.

    • Uses of Chord in music

      Fields in music with type parameters of type Chord 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<Chord> Tuplet.chords
      The chords in this tuplet
      Methods in music that return Chord 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Chord Chord.multiply(int numerator, int denominator)
      Multiply the duration of this chord by a fraction.
      Chord Key.process(Chord chord)
      Process a given Chord and apply the current Key to it.
      Methods in music that return types with arguments of type Chord 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<Chord> Utilities.flatten(java.util.List<? extends ChordSequence> chordSequences)
      Flattens a list of ChordSequences into a list of Chords
      java.util.List<Chord> Voice.getChords()
      Recursively calls getChords() on each ChordSequence and concatenates them into a flattened List.
      java.util.List<Chord> Tuplet.getChords()
      Scales the chords contained in this tuplet based on the type of the tuplet and returns a list of them.
      java.util.List<Chord> Repeat.getChords()
      Calls getChords() on the contained chord sequences and then returns a list that's common + endings[0] + common + endings[1] + ...
      java.util.List<Chord> Measure.getChords()
      Recursively calls getChords() on each ChordSequence in the measure, applies the key signature and accidentals to the notes in the returned list, and strips the accidentals off the notes in that list.
      java.util.List<Chord> EmptyChordSequence.getChords() 
      java.util.List<Chord> ChordSequenceList.getChords() 
      java.util.List<Chord> ChordSequence.getChords()
      Gets the chords associated with this ChordSequence.
      java.util.List<Chord> Chord.getChords() 
      Methods in music with parameters of type Chord 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Method parameters in music with type arguments of type Chord 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int Utilities.computeTicksPerBeat(java.util.List<Chord> chords)
      Computes a value of ticksPerBeat that allows us to represent all the given chords.
      static java.util.List<ReadyToAddItem> Utilities.getReadyToAddItems(java.util.List<Chord> chords)
      Computes a list of ReadyToAddItems (notes and lyrics), given a list of Chords.
      static java.util.List<ReadyToAddItem> Utilities.getReadyToAddItems(java.util.List<Chord> chords, int ticksPerBeat)
      Computes a list of ReadyToAddItems (notes and lyrics), given a list of Chords and the desired granularity of ticks (i.e., the number of ticks per beat).
